00031 //
00032 // This class provides encode/decode for RFC 2045 Base64 as
00033 // defined by RFC 2045, N. Freed and N. Borenstein.
00034 // RFC 2045: Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME)
00035 // Part One: Format of Internet Message Bodies. Reference
00036 // 1996 Available at: http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt
00037 // This class is used by XML Schema binary format validation
00038 //
00039 //
00040 class XMLUTIL_EXPORT Base64
00041 {
00042 public :
00043 
00044     enum Conformance
00045     {
00046         Conf_RFC2045
00047       , Conf_Schema
00048     };
00049 
00051 
00067     static XMLByte* encode(const XMLByte* const inputData
00068                          , const XMLSize_t      inputLength
00069                          , XMLSize_t*           outputLength
00070                          , MemoryManager* const memMgr = 0);
00071 
00091     static XMLByte* decode(
00092                            const XMLByte*        const   inputData
00093                          ,       XMLSize_t*              decodedLength
00094                          ,       MemoryManager*  const   memMgr = 0
00095                          ,       Conformance             conform = Conf_RFC2045
00096                           );
00097 
00117     static XMLByte* decodeToXMLByte(
00118                            const XMLCh*          const   inputData
00119                          ,       XMLSize_t*              decodedLength
00120                          ,       MemoryManager*  const   memMgr = 0
00121                          ,       Conformance             conform = Conf_RFC2045
00122                           );
00135     static int getDataLength(
00136                              const XMLCh*         const  inputData
00137                             ,      MemoryManager* const  memMgr = 0
00138                             ,      Conformance           conform = Conf_RFC2045
00139                              );
00140 
00142 
00158     static XMLCh* getCanonicalRepresentation
00159                   (
00160                       const XMLCh*          const inputData
00161                     ,       MemoryManager*  const memMgr = 0
00162                     ,       Conformance           conform = Conf_RFC2045
00163                   );
00164 
00165 private :
00166 
00167     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00168     //  Helper methods
00169     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 
00171     static XMLByte* decode(
00172                            const XMLByte*        const   inputData
00173                          ,       XMLSize_t*              outputLength
00174                          ,       XMLByte*&               canRepData
00175                          ,       MemoryManager*  const   memMgr = 0
00176                          ,       Conformance             conform = Conf_RFC2045
00177                           );
00178 
00179     static bool isData(const XMLByte& octet);
00180     static bool isPad(const XMLByte& octet);
00181 
00182     static XMLByte set1stOctet(const XMLByte&, const XMLByte&);
00183     static XMLByte set2ndOctet(const XMLByte&, const XMLByte&);
00184     static XMLByte set3rdOctet(const XMLByte&, const XMLByte&);
00185 
00186     static void split1stOctet(const XMLByte&, XMLByte&, XMLByte&);
00187     static void split2ndOctet(const XMLByte&, XMLByte&, XMLByte&);
00188     static void split3rdOctet(const XMLByte&, XMLByte&, XMLByte&);
00189 
00190     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00191     //  Unimplemented constructors and operators
00192     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00193     Base64();
00194     Base64(const Base64&);
00195 
00196     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00197     //  Private data members
00198     //
00199     //  base64Alphabet
00200     //     The Base64 alphabet (see RFC 2045).
00201     //
00202     //  base64Padding
00203     //     Padding character (see RFC 2045).
00204     //
00205     //  base64Inverse
00206     //     Table used in decoding base64.
00207     //
00208     //  isInitialized
00209     //     Set once base64Inverse is initialized.
00210     //
00211     //  quadsPerLine
00212     //     Number of quadruplets per one line. The encoded output
00213     //     stream must be represented in lines of no more
00214     //     than 19 quadruplets each.
00215     //
00216     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00217 
00218     static const XMLByte  base64Alphabet[];
00219     static const XMLByte  base64Padding;
00220 
00221     static const XMLByte  base64Inverse[];
00222 
00223     static const unsigned int  quadsPerLine;
00224 };
00225 
00226 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00227 //  Helper methods
00228 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00229 inline bool Base64::isPad(const XMLByte& octet)
00230 {
00231     return ( octet == base64Padding );
00232 }
00233 
00234 inline XMLByte Base64::set1stOctet(const XMLByte& b1, const XMLByte& b2)
00235 {
00236     return (( b1 << 2 ) | ( b2 >> 4 ));
00237 }
00238 
00239 inline XMLByte Base64::set2ndOctet(const XMLByte& b2, const XMLByte& b3)
00240 {
00241     return (( b2 << 4 ) | ( b3 >> 2 ));
00242 }
00243 
00244 inline XMLByte Base64::set3rdOctet(const XMLByte& b3, const XMLByte& b4)
00245 {
00246     return (( b3 << 6 ) | b4 );
00247 }
00248 
00249 inline void Base64::split1stOctet(const XMLByte& ch, XMLByte& b1, XMLByte& b2) {
00250     b1 = ch >> 2;
00251     b2 = ( ch & 0x3 ) << 4;
00252 }
00253 
00254 inline void Base64::split2ndOctet(const XMLByte& ch, XMLByte& b2, XMLByte& b3) {
00255     b2 |= ch >> 4;  // combine with previous value
00256     b3 = ( ch & 0xf ) << 2;
00257 }
00258 
00259 inline void Base64::split3rdOctet(const XMLByte& ch, XMLByte& b3, XMLByte& b4) {
00260     b3 |= ch >> 6;  // combine with previous value
00261     b4 = ( ch & 0x3f );
00262 }
